Class ControllerAgendaAdd

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllerAgenda.ControllerAgendaAdd

    public class ControllerAgendaAdd
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.CaretListener
    This class permits adding a new contact

    Laure

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControllerAgendaAdd

        public ControllerAgendaAdd(javax.swing.JButton addButton,
                           javax.swing.JTextField textField,
                           javax.swing.JTextField infoField,
                           javax.swing.JList list,
                           ModelAgenda model)
        Build agenda controller which allows the user to add new contact and to see it appears in the list
        Parameters:
        addButton - : the button that emits the action to add the contact
        textField - : the field that contains the new contact's name
        infoField - : the field that contains the information of the new contact
        list - : the contact list
        model - : the model to allows property file access. See ModelAgenda
